body_html: Oh... I've just realised... it seems your Notebook isn't connected to the kernel (the disconnection symbol in the upper right corner next to "Python 2"). You have to check why your Notebook isn't running properly. Any chance that we get to see the console output of your Jupyter session?

body: Oh... I've just realised... it seems your Notebook isn't connected to the kernel (the disconnection symbol in the upper right corner next to "Python 2"). You have to check why your Notebook isn't running properly. Any chance that we get to see the console output of your Jupyter session?
